premise_source_doc_sentence: Sir Timothy Miles Bindon `` Tim '' Rice  (  born 10 November 1944  )  is an English author and Academy Award , Golden Globe Award , Tony Award , and Grammy Award-winning lyricist .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Blondel , a rock opera musical by Tim Rice  (  book and lyrics  )  and Stephen Oliver  (  music  )  , was inspired by , and very loosely based on , the life of the eponymous French troubadour .
